fielddef.name: Event_Token
fielddef.comment: Single-word token for this event class

fielddef.name: Event_Name
fielddef.comment: Short name for this event class, suitable for an email message title

fielddef.name: Event_Description
fielddef.comment: Fuller description of this event class, suitable for an email body

fielddef.name: Event_Mail
fielddef.comment: If true, events of this type should be mailed

fielddef.name: Cc_Admin
fielddef.comment: If true, mail for this event will always be cc'ed to the admin performing the action

fielddef.name: Hidden_Label
fielddef.comment: Hidden composite label field. The contents of this label field is automatically set from the Event Token and Object Type Name fields.

fielddef.name: Name
fielddef.comment: The name of this ownership group

fielddef.name: Members
fielddef.comment: List of admin personae that are members of this owner set

fielddef.name: User
fielddef.comment: What user is this admin persona associated with?

fielddef.name: Persona_Name
fielddef.comment: The unique name for this admin persona

fielddef.name: Password
fielddef.comment: Persona password

fielddef.name: Owner_Sets
fielddef.comment: What owner sets are this persona members of?

fielddef.name: Roles
fielddef.comment: What permission matrices are this admin persona associated with?

fielddef.name: Admin_Console
fielddef.comment: If true, this persona can be used to access the admin console

fielddef.name: Full_Console
fielddef.comment: If true, this persona can kill users and edit the schema

fielddef.name: Name
fielddef.comment: The name of this permission matrix

fielddef.name: Owned_Object_Bits
fielddef.comment: Access bits, by object type

fielddef.name: Persona_entities
fielddef.comment: What personae are using this permission matrix?

fielddef.name: Option_Strings
fielddef.comment: Optional task parameters, interpreted by specific tasks if needed

fielddef.name: Sync_Master_Classname
fielddef.comment: Name of a custom SyncMaster class for elaborating incremental sync files for this Sync Channel.

fielddef.name: Queue_Directory
fielddef.comment: Location of the sync channel directory on disk

fielddef.name: Full_State_File
fielddef.comment: Path to the file to use for full-state XML dumps

fielddef.name: Service_Program
fielddef.comment: The location of the program to service this sync channel

fielddef.name: Sync_Data
fielddef.comment: The definitions for what object and fields we want to include in this sync channel

fielddef.name: Allow_Plaintext_Passwords
fielddef.comment: Allow Plaintext Passwords to be written to this Sync Channel

fielddef.name: XML_Label
fielddef.comment: This label is for use with the Ganymede xmlclient.

fielddef.name: Aliases
fielddef.comment: Alternate names for this list.

fielddef.name: Username
fielddef.comment: User name for an individual privileged to log into Ganymede and/or the network

regexp.desc: Usernames must start with a letter followed by letters, digits, or dashes

fielddef.name: Password
fielddef.comment: Password for an individual privileged to log into Ganymede and/or the network

regexp.desc: A Badge must match AWnnn where n is a digit, or a sequence of 4 or 5 digits.

fielddef.name: Groups
fielddef.comment: List of non-primary groups the user is a member of. Limited to 16 for NFS.

fielddef.name: Home_Directory
fielddef.comment: UNIX default directory, normally assigned by Ganymede

fielddef.name: Admin_Personae
fielddef.comment: A list of admin personae this user can assume

fielddef.name: Global_UID
fielddef.comment: Globally unique ID, for LDAP applications

fielddef.name: Email_Account_Type
fielddef.comment: Which type of mail server is holding the mail for this user?

fielddef.name: Exchange_Mail_Store
fielddef.comment: Which Exchange mail store is holding mail for this user?

fielddef.name: Global_UID
fielddef.comment: Globally unique ID, for LDAP applications

fielddef.name: System_Name
fielddef.comment: Name of this system, not including DNS domain information

regexp.desc: System Names may contain letters, numbers, and dashes. System names must start with a letter or a number.
System names must consist of letters, numbers, and dashes. System names must begin with a letter or a number.

fielddef.name: O.S.
fielddef.comment: What kind of O.S. is this system running?

fielddef.name: Virtual
fielddef.comment: If this is checked, the system will be recorded as a virtual overlay on another host.

fielddef.name: Volumes
fielddef.comment: What volumes are defined on this system?

fielddef.name: DHCP_Groups
fielddef.comment:
A list of custom DHCP declarations that this system shares in.
The DHCP configuration for this system will include the values defined in the DHCP groups linked in this field.

fielddef.name: Network_Name
fielddef.comment: A descriptive name for this network

fielddef.name: DHCP_Enabled
fielddef.comment: If checked, we will generate DHCP records for this network.

fielddef.name: Public_Network
fielddef.comment: If checked, all Ganymede admins have access to placing records on this network

fielddef.name: Records
fielddef.comment: What I.P. interfaces are on this net?

regexp.desc: Interface names may consist of letters, numbers, and dashes. Interface names must begin with a letter or a number.

fielddef.name: Owner_Netgroups
fielddef.comment: What netgroups is this netgroup contained in?

fielddef.name: Member_Netgroups
fielddef.comment: What netgroups are nested within us?

fielddef.name: Reservation_Name
fielddef.comment: A label for this reservation

fielddef.name: Names
fielddef.comment: System/Alias name to reserve

fielddef.name: Username
fielddef.comment: Entering a string in this field will prevent anyone from later creating a user, group, user netgroup, email list or alias from later being created in Ganymede that conflicts with this name.

regexp.desc: Mailman list names must start with a letter followed by letters, digits, pluses or dashes

fielddef.name: Mailman_Server
fielddef.comment: Which Mailman Server will this list be created on?

fielddef.name: List_Administrator_Email
fielddef.comment: Email address for the person who will be administering this mailing list.

fielddef.name: List_Password
fielddef.comment: Password used to administrate this list on mailman.

fielddef.name: Built-in
fielddef.comment:
If selected, this will be used as a DHCP statement, not as an option.
Should only be used for filename, next-server, etc.

fielddef.name: Custom_Option
fielddef.comment: If true, this option is a site-local custom option, whose name is not defined in IETF RFCs. A specific numeric code must be provided for custom options.

fielddef.name: Force_Send
fielddef.comment: If this field is checked, Ganymede will cause this field to be forcibly sent to the client, even if the client does not explicitly request it.

fielddef.name: Allow_Registered_Guests
fielddef.comment: If checked, this network will support roaming by Ethernet MAC addresses registered in Ganymede.

regexp.desc: Two four octet IPv4 addresses separated by a space.

fielddef.name: Mail_Store_Name
fielddef.comment: Ganymede label for this Exchange mail store.

fielddef.name: Exchange_MDB
fielddef.comment: Fully qualified LDAP DN for this Exchange Mail Store

fielddef.name: Users
fielddef.comment: Ganymede Users whose email is stored on this Exchange Mail Store
